trends: There has been one other sighting in St Joseph
There were no other sightings in St Joseph on or around August 11th 2011
Summary: a very large brite slow moveing light
divs: Sighting Detailsi had got up at 2 am to watch the preaides meteror shower saw bright slow moveing light it had no shape just a very very large bright light 100 to 150 feet above me at 418 am 8-12-11 it moved from the north west to the south east with no sound at all nor did i see any dark mass above it it was not a plane or hot air ballon it had no blinking ights and it was not drifting with the wind ( C ) of the light was white lasted mabey 5 to 6 m did not think to use my 20 by 60 bicnulars to get better look
